post.description: Returns channel-specific information regarding the types of refund that can be applied to the given order Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.ViewRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Returns a paged list of booked refund headers Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.ViewRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Returns a paged list of processed or acknowledged error refund headers Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.ViewRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Returns all RMA headers associated with the given order ID Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.ViewRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Returns all refund headers associated with the given order ID Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.ViewRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Returns a refund, given its header ID Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.ViewRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Creates a refund in the system for approval Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.CreateRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Updates an existing refund in the system. Requires create and delete permissions Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.CreateRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Acknowledges error responses for a given refund header Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.ApproveRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Acknowledges all error responses for a given RMA header Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.ReturnsExchanges.AcceptReturnsExchangesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Sends a refund to the channel for actioning Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.ApproveRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Deletes all lines from the given refund header that have not yet been processed, or acknowledged as errors, removing it from the "Actionable Refunds" screen. If no lines are left, the header row is deleted Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.DeleteRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Deletes all lines from the given RMA header that have not yet been processed, or acknowledged as errors, removing it from the "RMA Bookings" screen. If no lines are left, the header row is deleted Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.ReturnsExchanges.DeleteReturnsExchangesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Returns channel-specific information regarding the types of refund that can be applied to the given order Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.ReturnsExchanges.ViewReturnsExchangesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Returns a paged list of booked refund headers Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.ReturnsExchanges.ViewReturnsExchangesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Returns a paged list of processed or acknowledged error RMA headers Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.ReturnsExchanges.ViewReturnsExchangesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Creates an RMA booking in the system Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.ReturnsExchanges.CreateReturnsExchangesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Updates an RMA booking in the system. Requires create and delete permissions Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.ReturnsExchanges.CreateReturnsExchangesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Accepts a booked return or exchange in the system Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.ReturnsExchanges.AcceptReturnsExchangesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Gets all refund order items for all orders Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Gets all booked returns/exchange orders Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Deletes a returns/exchange order Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.ReturnsExchanges.DeleteReturnsExchangesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Action list of booked returns/exchange items for a given order ID. If the return is for a batched item, the batch must be booked in manually. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Delete a booked returns/exchange order item Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.ReturnsExchanges.DeleteReturnsExchangesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Refund an order given the order ID Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Gets all warehouse locations Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Edit booked exchange/return item Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Delete a refund item Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefunds.Refunds.DeleteRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Gets the refundable amount of an order Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: fkOrderId
parameters.description: unique order ID of the order

get.description: Searches through returns/refunds history that meets the parameters' criteria Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The lower end of the date range to search. Can be null if searching for 'all dates'. Maximum range is 3 months.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The upper end of the date range to search. Can be null if searching for 'all dates'. Maximum range is 3 months.

parameters.name: dateType
parameters.description: The search type (e.g. ALLDATES)

parameters.name: searchField
parameters.description: The field to search by. Can be found by calling GetSearchTypes.

parameters.name: exactMatch
parameters.description: Set to true if an exact match is required for the search data.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: The term which you are searching for.

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description: The page number of the request.

parameters.name: numEntriesPerPage
parameters.description: The number of entries required on a page. Maximum 200.

parameters.name: historyType
parameters.description: Search type. Allow RETURNS or REFUNDS

get.description: Creates a CSV file of the search result for download Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The lower end of the date range to search. Can be null if searching for 'all dates'. Maximum range is 3 months.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The upper end of the date range to search. Can be null if searching for 'all dates'. Maximum range is 3 months.

parameters.name: dateType
parameters.description: The search type (e.g. ALLDATES)

parameters.name: searchField
parameters.description: The field to search by. Can be found by calling GetSearchTypes.

parameters.name: exactMatch
parameters.description: Set to true if an exact match is required for the search data.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: The term which you are searching for.

parameters.name: sortColumn
parameters.description: The column to sort by

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: The sort direction (true = ascending, false = descending).

parameters.name: historyType
parameters.description: Search type. Allow RETURNS or REFUNDS

get.description: Gets a list of valid search types. These are needed to search processed orders. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ReturnsRefundsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: historyType
parameters.description: Search type. Allow RETURNS or REFUNDS

request.description: The request class for this call

RefundHeaderId.description: If included, will return the relevant refund header as part of the RefundOptions object in the response

request.description: The request class for this call

Page.description: The page number to return for a given set of filters

Filters.description: A set of filters to restrict the refund headers output by the call

TotalHeaders.description: A count of the total number of refund headers matching the filter set by the request

HeadersPerPage.description: A count of the number of refund headers returned per page

RefundHeaders.description: A collection of refund headers matching the filter set by the request

request.description: The request class for this call
The request class for this call
The request class for this call

RefundHeaderId.description: The unique identifier for the refund header to load

OrderId.description: The unique identifier for the order this refund pertains to. Used as a safety to ensure the correct refund is being worked with

RefundHeaderId.description: The unique identifier for the loaded refund

RefundLines.description: A collection of all refunds associated with the loaded header

RefundOptions.description: Channel-specific information about refund requirements, e.g. accepted refund reasons

request.description: The request class for this call

ChannelInitiated.description: Determines whether the refund was initiated on the channel, or within Linnworks

OrderId.description: The unique identifier for the order this refund is associated with

RefundLines.description: A collection of line-level refunds detailing the refund as a whole

RefundHeaderId.description: The unique identifier for the refund header.

RefundReference.description: An automatically generated string to help identify the refund

Status.description: Identifies the overall state of the refund and its approval on the channel

CannotRefundReason.description: If the validation has failed at any stage, this field identifies the cause of the failure

Errors.description: Any global validation errors are added to this list, as well as any errors from the RefundLines collection

RefundLines.description: A collection of validated line-level refunds, with any applicable errors included

request.description: The request class for this call

RefundHeaderId.description: The unique identifier for the refund header whose errors will be acknowledged

RefundRowIds.description: A list of row ids to acknowledge errors for. Can be left empty when "AcknowledgeAllErrors" is set to true

AcknowledgeAllErrors.description: Ignores the RefundRowIds list and acknowledges all errors for the given refund header id

EntireRefundHeaderSetToErrorAcked.description: Determines whether the entire refund header was set to "ERROR_ACKED" state as a result of this call (will be found in the History tab)

request.description: The request class for this call

RMAHeaderId.description: The unique identifier for the RMA header whose errors will be acknowledged

RMARowIds.description: A list of row ids to acknowledge errors for

AcknowledgeAllErrors.description: Ignores the RefundRowIds list and acknowledges all errors for the given rma header id

EntireRMAHeaderSetToErrorAcked.description: Determines whether the entire RMA header was set to "ERROR_ACKED" state as a result of this call (will be found in the History tab)

RMAHeaderId.description: An identifier for the RMA request header being worked with. Newly created RMA headers will have this field populated as part of the "Create" request

Items.description: A collection of verified and validated items that have been added to this RMA request

Errors.description: Any global validation errors are included in this collection, along with a concatenation of any errors found in an individual item

Info.description: Any global validation information is included in this collection, along with a concatenation of any information found in an individual item

request.description: The request class for this call

RefundHeaderId.description: The unique identifier for the refund header to action

OrderId.description: The order ID this refund header pertains to. Used as a double-step verification to ensure the right refund header is being actioned

Request.description: When actioning a refund beyond the initial approval, the channel may require additional information, which can be passed via this field. Not required

SuccessfullyActioned.description: Determines whether the header was marked as actioned in the database

RefundReference.description: An automatically generated string to help identify the refund

Status.description: Identifies the overall state of the refund and its approval on the channel

CannotRefundReason.description: If the validation has failed at any stage, this field identifies the cause of the failure

Errors.description: Any global validation errors are added to this list, as well as any errors from the RefundLines collection

RefundLines.description: A collection of validated line-level refunds, with any applicable errors included

ReasonTag.description: Reason for deleting the refund. Channel Dependant

RejectOnChannel.description: Bool to say whether rejection note should be sent to the channel

request.description: The request class for this call

ChannelInitiated.description: Determines whether the RMA request was initiated on the channel, or within Linnworks

OrderId.description: The unique identifier for the order a return booking is being created for

ReturnItems.description: A collection of items to be returned as part of this booking

ExchangeItems.description: A collection of items to be exchanged as part of this booking

ResendItems.description: A collection of items to be resent as part of this booking

Reference.description: (Optional) If provided, sets the External Reference of the RMA header to the provided value. Otherwise, this value is automatically generated

Errors.description: Any global validation errors are included in this collection, along with a concatenation of any errors found in an individual item

Info.description: Any global validation information is included in this collection, along with a concatenation of any information found in an individual item

ExchangeItems.description: A collection of updated exchange items

ResendItems.description: A collection of updated resend items

AllowCreationOfNewOrder.description: If an existing RMA order has been deleted or cancelled, this flag determines whether a new one should be created, or an error should be returned

request.description: The request class for this call

RMAHeaderId.description: The unique identifier for the RMA header to action

OrderId.description: The order ID this RMA header pertains to. Used as a double-step verification to ensure the right RMA header is being actioned

Request.description: When actioning an RMA beyond the initial approval, the channel may require additional information, which can be passed via this field. Not required

RefundHeaderId.description: If a refund was created as part of accepting the return/exchange booking, this identifies the created header

Status.description: For the header that was actioned, returns its status

SuccessfullyActioned.description: Determines whether the header was marked as actioned in the database

pkReturnId.description: unique row ID of the return/exchange item

bookedReturnsExchangeItem.description: The updated booked return/exchange item object

fkOrderId.description: unique order ID of the refund order
